treks.title: Everest Base Camp Trek
treks.description: Experience the ultimate Himalayan adventure with our classic Everest Base Camp trek.
treks.overview: The Everest Base Camp Trek is a once-in-a-lifetime adventure that takes you to the foot of the world's highest mountain. This 14-day journey combines spectacular mountain scenery with rich Sherpa culture.

itinerary.title: Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Welcome to Nepal! Transfer to hotel, trek briefing, and welcome dinner.

itinerary.title: Fly to Lukla, trek to Phakding
itinerary.description: Scenic mountain flight followed by easy trek through pine forests.

itinerary.title: Phakding to Namche Bazaar
itinerary.description: Cross suspension bridges, enter Sagarmatha National Park, steep climb to the Sherpa capital.

itinerary.title: Acclimatization in Namche
itinerary.description: Hike to Everest View Hotel for panoramic mountain views.

itinerary.title: Namche to Tengboche
itinerary.description: Trek through rhododendron forests to famous monastery.

itinerary.title: Reach Everest Base Camp
itinerary.description: Finally arrive at the iconic Everest Base Camp at 5,364m!

treks.title: Annapurna Circuit Trek
treks.description: Circle the Annapurna Massif on this legendary trek, crossing Thorong La pass at 5,416m.
treks.overview: The Annapurna Circuit offers incredible diversity in landscapes from subtropical forests to high alpine desert.

treks.title: Langtang Valley Trek
treks.description: Explore the stunning Langtang Valley, known as the 'Valley of Glaciers'.
treks.overview: The Langtang Valley Trek offers a perfect introduction to Himalayan trekking.

treks.title: Bhutan Cultural Tour
treks.description: Discover the Land of the Thunder Dragon with visits to ancient dzongs and monasteries.
treks.overview: Experience the magic of Bhutan, where happiness is valued above GDP.

treks.title: Manaslu Circuit Trek
treks.description: Trek around the world's eighth highest mountain through remote villages.
treks.overview: Less crowded alternative to Annapurna with authentic Himalayan experience.

treks.title: Upper Mustang Trek
treks.description: Journey to the hidden kingdom of Lo preserving ancient Tibetan Buddhist culture.
treks.overview: Remote restricted region with preserved Tibetan culture and stunning desert scenery.

testimonials.name: Sarah Johnson
testimonials.text: The Everest Base Camp trek with Super Treks was absolutely incredible! Our guide Rajesh was knowledgeable, patient, and made sure we were safe throughout.

testimonials.name: Michael Chen
testimonials.text: Best trekking company in Nepal! The attention to detail and genuine care was outstanding. Already planning my next trek!

testimonials.name: Emma Schmidt
testimonials.text: The Annapurna Circuit exceeded all expectations. Perfect organization and commitment to sustainable tourism.

testimonials.name: David Martinez
testimonials.text: Outstanding service from start to finish. The guide's local knowledge added so much to the experience!
